El Sayed Badreya (Arabic) bụ onye Egypt-American na-eme ihe nkiri. A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1957 na Port Said, Egypt.
O nweela ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Ọ pụtara na AmericanEast, Iron Man, [isi iyi bipụtara onwe ya] Cargo, na The Dictator  O nyekwara mmegharị na ọrụ olu maka onye ohi Rameses na Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception
